text: Lafayette Municipal Airport is a city-owned, public-use airport located two nautical miles (3 km) west of the central business district of Lafayette, in Macon County, Tennessee, United States. ==Facilities== Lafayette Municipal Airport covers an area of at an elevation of 969 feet (295m) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 01/19 with an asphalt surface measuring 5,200 by 75 feet (1,585 x 23 m). == References == == External links == * Lafayette, TN city website Category:Airports in Tennessee Category:Transportation in Macon County, Tennessee Category:Buildings and structures in Macon County, Tennessee
title: Lafayette Municipal Airport (Tennessee)
